metadata.synopsis: When his lover (Rachel Ward) is accused of murder, a Salt Lake City family man (Bruce Boxleitner) is her eyewitness and his wife (Sela Ward) is her attorney.

reviews: A tricky plot about a she-devil coming into the lives of a married couple-sound familiar?-kicks off strongly (with a good, scary look at a man and woman scaling a high cliff) and holds up well enough despite a knuckle-headed hero.
